newsitem.title: USA: Zonagen raises $67.5 mln in offering.
newsitem.headline: Zonagen raises $67.5 mln in offering.

text.p: Zonagen Inc said Wednesday that it had completed a secondary public offering of 2,250,000 shares of common stock at $30 per share, raising $67.5 million.
It said all shares were sold by the company.
The funds, said the company, will be used for further clinical development of and regulatory submissions relating to Vasomax, an oral treatment for impotence, and the company's leading product.
Zonagen also said it will pursue research and development of other products as well as using the proceeds for general corporate purposes.
Zonagen is a biopharmaceutical company specializing in treatments for diseases of the human reproductive system.
